verbose_text: RNF213, which was mutated at the highest frequency (2.7%) among the 11 novel SMGs, encodes an E3 ubiquitin protein ligase that is known to degrade NFAT1 XREF_BIBR, a transcription factor that can in turn activate MDM2 for promoting p53 degradation XREF_BIBR.
evidence: ubiquitin-protein ligase that is known to degrade NFAT1
